column3:
There was once a small town by a river. There were many houses in this town and they were
ewlineall different colors, shapes and sizes. which made the people happy.  On one street there
ewlinewas a red house, a green house, a blue house and one purple house with yellow stripes. The
ewlinepeople in the town were all very friendly and knew each other well.
ewline
ewlineWhen the people of the town went out they loved to wear hats but never wore shoes and the
ewlinehats were also many different colors, shapes and sizes. On Sundays all the families in
ewlinetown would go to the park by the river and have picnics. The children would run, skip and
ewlineplay and the parents would talk, eat and laugh. The children loved the picnic foods they
ewlinehad. There were hot dogs, hamburgers, chicken and steak. They also had salads, coleslaw,
ewlinefries and chips. The kids' favorite was hamburgers with fries.
ewline
ewlineOn days when it rained the children and parents would stay inside and read or color
ewlinepictures and drink hot chocolate and they loved to wear big warm sweaters. At night the
ewlinefamily would all go to the kitchen and cook dinner together and after dinner was finished
ewlinethey would all clear the table and clean the dishes together before getting ready for
ewlinebed. They would put their pajamas on but never wear socks and they would get under the
ewlinecovers and fall asleep.
